pkgmetadata.longdescription: # graph-cliA CLI utility to create graphs from CSV files.`graph-cli` is designed to be highly configurable for easy and detailedgraph generation. It has many flags to acquire this detail and usesreasonable defaults to avoid bothering the user. It also leverageschaining, so you can create complex graphs from multiple CSV files.Source: [mcastorina/graph-cli](https://github.com/mcastorina/graph-cli)## DonateI develop this software in my spare time. If you find it useful, considerbuying me a coffee! Thank you![![ko-fi](https://www.ko-fi.com/img/donate_sm.png)](https://ko-fi.com/O5O0LAWC)
